TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Why yes, looks like a two front war against the noodle.

Waiter,there's a pun in my soup!

You're funny.

Waiter, there's a nuclear war in my soup!

yes,just wait a thousand years to cool down.

Waiter, there's whole in my soup!

You wanted whole grain in your soup. Stop complaining.

Waiter, there's a Nokia 3310 melted into my soup!

Drink while it is hot!

Waiter, there is red cabbage in my soup!

Sir, that's a jellyfish - you ordered jellyfish soup.

Fly!!! There's a soup in my waiter! >:-[

Welp stop throwing food everywhere good sir!

Waiter there's hole in my soup!

Stop spinning your spoon so fast then!

Waiter! There's a booster in my soup!

Oh, those oranges? They are good for you. Boosts your ability to fight infections.

Waiter, there's just plain water in my soup!

That's not soup. That's your complimentary glass of water for our slow service.

Waiter, there's a KSP 0.25 in my soup!

That's not your soup bowl, that's the entry hatch to the time machine. Your SOUP is over there --->

Soup!!! There's a waiter in my fly! >:-[

What are you asking me for? I'm just a soup!

Waiter, there's a contract in my soup!

Edited July 24, 2014 by Tery215

I have Kerbin in my soup! Actually, my soup had become Kerbin's atmosphere

And Gene Kerman took the contract he found in the soup.
Waiter, there's a paper in my soup! It says: iPhone or Android?

Ick! We'll have to get you a new soup! ... And a new wireless plan!

Waiter, there's a tentacle in my sop! It's still moving.

This is related.. Somehow to the next call for the waiter..

WAITER THERE'S A KRAKEN IN MY SOUP!

RUN! Oh wait it controls everything because physics. Well, goodbye universe!

Waiter, there's a

in my soup!

You left your mobile device in it.

( The Kraken comes out from the depths of the soup and eats it )

Waiter, there's a TARDIS in my soup!

That's a TV remote for that big screen on the dome overhead. (Simpsons movie reference)

Waiter, there's a robot in my- Aperture Science Aux- ERROR 99999

Yes, and there's a companion cube in it.

Waiter! There's a Salty Spitoon in my soup!

How tough are ye? Tough enough to eat it?

(If so, it will likely have a nice pleasant crusty-tobacco taste to it. Yum yum!)

Waiter, there's a soup spoon in my soup!

Use it, then.

Waiter, there's a GLaDOS in my soup!

You ordered Aperture Soup, Sir.

Waiter, there's a Dalek in my soup!

He's just sliced, so what's the problem?

Waiter, there is nothing in nothing!

*Waiter ceases to exsist*

Waiter, there's a turd in my soup!
